Entry.JapaneseText: どうして私……角を折ったりしたの……ハーフで なくなるわけでもないのに……バカみたい……
Entry.EnglishText: Why did I go... and break off my horns... It's not as though that would stop me from being a Half... I was a fool...

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラさんにも角がありましたよね……
ええ……この角も姿も、父と母から受け継いだもの。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... My horns and my appearance are what I inherited from my mother and father.

Entry.JapaneseText: 父と母に愛されるべく産まれた私の……証……
Entry.EnglishText: They are the proof... That I was born to be loved by my parents...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん……もう少しです。 がんばって……！
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... You're almost through this. Keep going!
